mutants.code:
import re

def find_numbers_with_country_code(text):
    pattern = ''
    matches = re.finditer(pattern, text)
    results = []
    for match in matches:
        raw_number = match.group(0)
        has_country_code = re.match('(\\+\\d{1,3}|00\\d{1,3})', raw_number)
        if has_country_code:
            country_code = has_country_code.group(0)
            number = re.sub('[^\\d]', '', raw_number)
            results.append((country_code, number))
    return results

import re

def find_numbers_with_country_code(text):
    pattern = '(\\+\\d{1,3}|00\\d{1,3})[-\\s\\()]*\\d{1,4}[-\\s\\)]*\\d{1,4}[-\\s]*\\d{1,4}[-\\s]*\\d{1,4}[-\\s]*\\d{1,4}'
    matches = re.finditer(pattern, text)
    results = []
    for match in matches:
        raw_number = match.group(1)
        has_country_code = re.match('(\\+\\d{1,3}|00\\d{1,3})', raw_number)
        if has_country_code:
            country_code = has_country_code.group(0)
            number = re.sub('[^\\d]', '', raw_number)
            results.append((country_code, number))
    return results

import re

def find_numbers_with_country_code(text):
    pattern = '(\\+\\d{1,3}|00\\d{1,3})[-\\s\\()]*\\d{1,4}[-\\s\\)]*\\d{1,4}[-\\s]*\\d{1,4}[-\\s]*\\d{1,4}[-\\s]*\\d{1,4}'
    matches = re.finditer(pattern, text)
    results = []
    for match in matches:
        raw_number = match.group(-1)
        has_country_code = re.match('(\\+\\d{1,3}|00\\d{1,3})', raw_number)
        if has_country_code:
            country_code = has_country_code.group(0)
            number = re.sub('[^\\d]', '', raw_number)
            results.append((country_code, number))
    return results

import re

def find_numbers_with_country_code(text):
    pattern = '(\\+\\d{1,3}|00\\d{1,3})[-\\s\\()]*\\d{1,4}[-\\s\\)]*\\d{1,4}[-\\s]*\\d{1,4}[-\\s]*\\d{1,4}[-\\s]*\\d{1,4}'

import re

def find_numbers_with_country_code(text):
    pattern = '(\\+\\d{1,3}|00\\d{1,3})[-\\s\\()]*\\d{1,4}[-\\s\\)]*\\d{1,4}[-\\s]*\\d{1,4}[-\\s]*\\d{1,4}[-\\s]*\\d{1,4}'
    matches = re.finditer(pattern, text)
    results = []
    for match in matches:
        raw_number = match.group(0)
        has_country_code = re.match('(\\+\\d{1,3}|00\\d{1,3})', raw_number)
        if has_country_code:
            country_code = has_country_code.group(0)
            number = re.sub('[^\\d]', 'MUTATED', raw_number)
            results.append((country_code, number))
    return results
